clinical_history: Follow-up imaging for known pulmonary nodule.
findings: Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of mediastinum.
Well-defined nodule measuring 16 mm in mediastinum.
Mediastinal widening observed with soft tissue density.
Collapse of mediastinum lobe with volume loss.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in mediastinum.
recommendations: Clinical correlation advised; refer to pulmonologist.
